body_html:
Yes, I understood your intention.

So, I discarded previous commit which adds TF_CPP_MAX_VLOG_LEVEL.
Instead, I added VLOG level to VLOG messages as mentioned before.

This will enable to distinguish which VLOG level is.
And I also think it will be better way than adding max level.
body_text:
Yes, I understood your intention.
So, I discarded previous commit which adds TF_CPP_MAX_VLOG_LEVEL.
Instead, I added VLOG level to VLOG messages as mentioned before.
This will enable to distinguish which VLOG level is.
And I also think it will be better way than adding max level.
body:
Yes, I understood your intention.

So, I discarded previous commit which adds TF_CPP_MAX_VLOG_LEVEL.
Instead, I added VLOG level to VLOG messages as mentioned before.

This will enable to distinguish which VLOG level is.
And I also think it will be better way than adding max level.
